summary: 2006 CHEVROLET MALIBU.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO POWER STEERING MALFUNCTION WHILE DRIVING.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED WHILE DRIVING, THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED UP AND THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO STEER THE WHEEL RIGHT OR LEFT.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER, WHERE THE STEERING COLUMN ASSEMBLY WAS REPLACED AT A COST OF $ 703.90. THE CONSUMER SUBMITTED SENT IN A RECALL FOR THE STEERING. *JB
